name: artechulate
description: Web3.0  information hub for innovative and disruptive technoligies such as Cryptocurrency, Blockchain, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Robotics, Autonomous driving, Data security and analytics. Artechluate features white papers, technical overviews, news, NFT's and articles from the communities content creators.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
